verbose_text: Purified PhoB protein (~ 35 muM) was phosphorylated with 50 mM phosphoramidate for at least 1.5 h and different concentrations of PhoBP were subsequently incubated with approximately 0.1 mM fluorescent DNA for 30 min in the presence of 15 muM non fluorescent competitor dsDNA oligos.
evidence: Purified PhoB protein (~35 muM) was phosphorylated
